name: Treasure of AgonDray: Intro Level (greybox)
description:
Title: Treasure of ArgonDray

Platform: PC Game / Web Game

Genre: Action-Adventure

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, fans of 3d Action-Adventure Games

Game Overview:

Intro level to the Treasure of ArgonDray.  Is currently only a greybox.  

You are an adventure on a quest to find treasure in the layer of ArgonDray, an unknown beast.  You are captured and put in a cell.  Now you must escape to save your life and hopefully find the treasure along the way.

Instructions: WASD to move, shift to run, mouse to control the camera

Game Design Team:

Brennan Gillespie – Game Designer
